It happens all the time to me.

Can you stop the parts scroll from going all the way to the top and overlapping the "exit" button.

You mouse over the part beside the X and you actually click the exit button.

If the part list can stop loading around the line or under.

Cheers'

Miro

Edited October 29, 2014 by Claw

I thought this issue had been resolved, but evidently not completely.

Could you please indicate which game version and OS you are using?

Ok, I just took another look at this. Clicking on a stage icon over the exit button clicks 'through' to the exit button.

However, by clicking and dragging, you can still drag a stage icon which is positioned over the exit button, without exiting the VAB.

Are you saying that mousing over the exit button is causing the exit, or that single-clicking over the icon is causing the exit?

Again, click and drag should work now (in 0.25).

Also, thanks for bringing this up, I had forgotten there is still some oddness when staging overlaps the top of the screen.
